fuel.name: Fuel
fuel.description: A can of fuel, should be able to used on the spacecraft.

engine.name: Engine
engine.description: The engine fell off from the spacecraft during the crash.

bio_suit.name: Bio Suit
bio_suit.description: A hazmat suit, consists of an impermeable whole-body garment worn as protection against hazardous materials.

TM.name: TM 11-2F-35AV3
TM.description: This is the Technical Manual of the spacecraft, maybe I could use it to find out how to fix the spacecraft.
TM.location: ***TBD, should be in the same place when player start***

keycard.name: Keycard
keycard.description: A key card, it has a symbol look the same with the one on the door of the server room.

basement_key.name: Metal Key
basement_key.description: An old metal key, covered with dust.

toolkit.name: Toolkit
toolkit.description: It is an OEM "QuickFix" toolkit, it fell off from the spacecraft.

GPS.name: GPS
GPS.description: This thing looks like a GPS, let's see what it does

knife.name: Knife
knife.location: ***TBD should be at the first location***

rifle.name: Rifle
rifle.description: A rifle with an empty magazine. Fairly new condition.

laser_gun.name: Laser Gun
laser_gun.description: A laser gun, nothing in the magazine well, looks like a battery pack could fit in there.

IMTV.name: IMTV
IMTV.description: Improved Modular Tactical Vest, it's always good to have a body armor on.

ACH.name: ACH
ACH.description: It's not just a helmet, it is an Advanced Combat Helmet, made of Kevlar.

boots.name: Boots
boots.description: A pair of tactical boots, brand new.
